002
003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.tpptokenization;
004
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.Map.Entry;
008import java.util.Set;
009
010import javax.json.JsonObject;
011import javax.json.JsonString;
012
013import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.abstracttppstep.AbstractTppProcessingStep;
014import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.abstracttppstep.JsonResponseAttributeType;
015import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.abstracttppstep.ProcessingBiConsumer;
016import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.ProcessingException;
017import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.tpptokenization.entity.TppTokenizedTextDocument;
018import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.tpptokenization.entity.TppTokenizedTextWithTitleDocument;
019
020/**
021 * Tokenizes documents, according to the provided parameters, using Text
022 * Processing Python.
023 * <p>
024 * Example declaration for this step in a process definition file:
025 * </p>
026 * <pre>
027 * {@code <step action="TppTokenization">
028 *      <parameters>
029 *              <tpp:endpoint>http://127.0.0.1:5005/tpp/v1/casual-tokenize</tpp:endpoint>
030 *              <textDocumentWithTitleTableName>submission</textDocumentWithTitleTableName>
031 *              <textDocumentTableName>comment</textDocumentTableName>
032 *      </parameters>
033 * </step>}
034 * </pre>
035 *
036 * @author Alejandro González García
037 */
038final class TppTokenizationProcessingStep extends AbstractTppProcessingStep {
039        /**
040         * Instantiates a Text Processing Python tokenization processing step.
041         */
042        TppTokenizationProcessingStep() {
043                super(
044                        // Additional mandatory and optional parameters, with their validation function
045                        Map.of(),
046                        // Additional mandatory parameters
047                        Set.of(),
048                        // Result entity types
049                        List.of(TppTokenizedTextWithTitleDocument.class, TppTokenizedTextDocument.class),
050                        // Step description format string
051                        "Tokenizing %s",
052                        // JSON response attribute type
053                        JsonResponseAttributeType.STRING_ARRAY,
054                        // Request parameters action
055                        new NullProcessingConsumer<>(),
056                        // Attribute store action
057                        new TokenStoreAction()
058                );
059        }
060
061        /**
062         * Parses a tokenized document attribute from the corresponding Text Processing
063         * Python JSON response object.
064         *
065         * @author Alejandro González García
066         */
067        private static final class TokenStoreAction implements ProcessingBiConsumer<Entry<String, JsonObject>, Map<String, String>> {
068                @Override
069                public void accept(
070                        final Entry<String, JsonObject> returnedAttributeObject, final Map<String, String> processedAttributesMap
071                ) throws ProcessingException {
072                        try {
073                                final StringBuilder tokenizedAttributeBuilder = new StringBuilder();
074
075                                final List<JsonString> attributeTokens = returnedAttributeObject.getValue()
076                                        .getJsonArray("text").getValuesAs(JsonString.class);
077
078                                for (final JsonString token : attributeTokens) {
079                                        tokenizedAttributeBuilder.append(token.getString());
080                                        tokenizedAttributeBuilder.append(' ');
081                                }
082
083                                // Delete extra space at the end if it was added
084                                final int tokenizedAttributeLength = tokenizedAttributeBuilder.length();
085                                if (tokenizedAttributeLength > 0) {
086                                        tokenizedAttributeBuilder.deleteCharAt(tokenizedAttributeLength - 1);
087                                }
088
089                                processedAttributesMap.put(returnedAttributeObject.getKey(), tokenizedAttributeBuilder.toString());
090                        } catch (final Exception exc) {
091                                throw new ProcessingException(
092                                        "An exception occurred while processing the tokenized document", exc
093                                );
094                        }
095                }
096        }
097}
